textContent:
---aftereffects---

Hi reirei! I'm writing this entry very early in the morning the day after our first date. I couldn't sleep anymore because I just couldn't stop thinking about what happened yesterday. I couldn't believe it went as well as it did! It's the most memorable and romantic and sweet first date I've ever had! And most of the reason for why is because I spent the day with you.

You truly are one of a kind! The level of comfort and ease I feel whenever I am with you is really unbelievable considering we've only had our first date yesterday and we've been talking for only about three weeks.

---i miss you already---

One of the letters talked about how I miss you a lot. And now I miss you even more than before. I miss hugging you. I miss holding your hands. I miss kiss your hands. I miss kissing your cheeks. I miss staring at you while you talk. I miss you staring at me while I talk. I can't wait until the next time we meet again Babe!
title: January 20, 2024
textContentHtml:
---aftereffects---


Hi reirei! I'm writing this entry very early in the morning the day after our first date. I couldn't sleep anymore because I just couldn't stop thinking about what happened yesterday. I couldn't believe it went as well as it did! It's the most memorable and romantic and sweet first date I've ever had! And most of the reason for why is because I spent the day with you.


You truly are one of a kind! The level of comfort and ease I feel whenever I am with you is really unbelievable considering we've only had our first date yesterday and we've been talking for only about three weeks.


---i miss you already---


One of the letters talked about how I miss you a lot. And now I miss you even more than before. I miss hugging you. I miss holding your hands. I miss kiss your hands. I miss kissing your cheeks. I miss staring at you while you talk. I miss you staring at me while I talk. I can't wait until the next time we meet again Babe!
